**2022-11-09 / @rsc, @ianlancetaylor, @bradfitz, @andybons, @aclements**

**Accepted**

- **cmd/go: add a flag to use stdin as a cancellation side-channel** [#56163](https://go.dev/issue/56163)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **cmd/go: standard-library vendoring in module mode** [#30241](https://go.dev/issue/30241)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **go/analysis: specify that all facts are encoded in one gulp, preserving topology** [#54661](https://go.dev/issue/54661)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ
- **net: add UDPMsg, (\*UDPConn).ReadUDPMsgs, (\*UDPConn).WriteUDPMsgs** [#45886](https://go.dev/issue/45886)
  - no change in consensus; **accepted** üéâ

**Declined**

- **function: runes.repeat** [#56434](https://go.dev/issue/56434)
  - proposal retracted by author; **declined**
- **net/netip: Add function Network() for netip Addr to make it support the interface of net.Addr** [#56286](https://go.dev/issue/56286)
  - no change in consensus; **declined**
- **time: Add time.Day constant** [#56460](https://go.dev/issue/56460)
  - duplicate of #11473

  - **likely accept**; last call for comments ‚è≥

- **os/exec: add GODEBUG flag to print a line to STDERR for each command started** [#56301](https://go.dev/issue/56301)
  - **likely decline**; last call for comments ‚è≥
